ValidationRule.description: GDC should only create in Draft and change to Closed. They should not move it to In Registration or Registered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" ), $Permission.DS_GDC, ISCHANGED(Status__c) , OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Registration') , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Draft') ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c) , 'Registered') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are only allowed to set to closed from this status
